text: Craig Bartlett (born October 18, 1956) is an American voice actor and the Creator of Hey Arnold!. ==Filmography== ===Television=== * Hey Arnold! - Abner, Brainy, DJ Nocturnal Ned, Miles (Arnold's Father) * Party Wagon - Romeo ===Movies=== * Claymation Christmas Celebration - Announcer ("Carol of the Bells" segment) * Hey Arnold!: The Movie - Brainy, Grubby, Monkeyman, Murray * The Adventures of Mark Twain - Calaveras Miner ==Staff Work== * Hey Arnold! - Creator, Director * Hey Arnold!: The Movie - Producer, Writer * Rugrats - Story Editor Category:American voice actors
title: Craig Bartlett
